Title: MapControl for WM6
Description: Simple map control which using static maps from Bing/Google Maps
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Simple map control which using static maps from Bing/Google Maps

Actualy it's using only Bing Maps (Google Maps license permit static maps only with web page).

Features
  • using Bing Static Maps
  • cache for map's tiles
  • event handlers
  • marker and abstract class for creating custom map elements

Special thanks:
  • GeoFramework http://geoframework.codeplex.com/
  • GeoGraphical.net http://code.google.com/p/geographical-dot-net/
  • "Alphablending with NETCF" http://blogs.msdn.com/b/chrislorton/archive/2006/04/07/570649.aspx
